data.title: Enugu Born Philanthropist Chief Obasi Moses Anayo Organizes Memorial Service In Honour Of His Late Parents, Declares Empowerment For Youths And Women
data.meta_description: Enugu Born Philanthropist Chief Obasi Moses Anayo Organizes Memorial Service In Honour Of His Late Parents, Declares Empowerment For Youths And Women An Enugu born politician and philanthropist High Chief Obasi Moses Anayo is the Special Adviser to Chief Uche Nnaji, Honourable Minister for Innovation, Science and Technology, who hails from Obeagu Oduma, Aninri Local‚Ä¶
data.text:
An Enugu born politician and philanthropist High Chief Obasi Moses Anayo is the Special Adviser to Chief Uche Nnaji, Honourable Minister for Innovation, Science and Technology, who hails from Obeagu Oduma, Aninri Local Government Area of Enugu State.He is organizing a memorial service in honour of their late parents who died years ago

Chief Anayo Obasi had unbroken love and bonds with his late parents late Elder Michael and late Mrs Elizabeth Obasi while they were alive and decides to honour them with bouyant postumous Remembrance

However, as a blessed wealthy man and philanthropist per excellence, Moses‚Äôs kind gestures has attracted countless fames, prestigious awards and famous chieftaincy titles across states to include the most recent title of Nwachinemere 1 of Awa Ancient kingdom of Abia State, Nigeria

Presently, charitable people are very scarce, it sparks hope in our time to find a generous giver like him in our modern society with such unbridled conviction who can invest in humanity

This magnanimous young and handsome king Nwachinemere 1 of Awa Ancient Kingdom being a human capital developer has intendment of spicing up the memorial service with the empowering of 100 youths and women on 30th December, 2023 by 10am at his country home Umunoke Obeagu Oduma.

Honestly speaking, fortune is placing the people of the area on the map of history because it‚Äôs not easy for a man to invest his hard earned wealth on his people in this era of unquenchable material acquisitions, therefore such patriotic gesture of generosity call for commendation from good spirited individuals in the society

Indeed,humanity will always be proud of him

The general public are hereby cordially invited to grace the occasion

Your esteemed presence will be appreciatedüôèüèæ.

Thanks
